alert.note: Alert for Schleicher (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 7:52PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Schleicher County through 830 PM CDT... At 751 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Eldorado. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eldorado and Us-277 Near The Sutton-Schleicher County Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
